p: In the present study, Use report value varied from 2 to 43. Acacia modesta, Mentha longifolia, Oxalis corniculata, Morchella esculenta, Withania somnifera, Zanthoxylum armatum, Azadirachta indica, Berberis lycium, Aconitum violaceum, Agaricus campestris, Dodonaea viscosa and Solanum surattense were the most used plant species.
